Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah returned to international cricket with two wickets in his first over.
Barry McCarthy and Curtis Campher put up 57 runs off 44 balls for the seventh wicket.
Barry McCarthy finished unbeaten on 51 off 33 balls.
India were two runs ahead of the DLS par score when the match was called off due to rain.
India won the match by 2 runs via DLS method.
Post-Match Reflections: Jasprit Bumrah's impressive return to international cricket was a key takeaway.
Barry McCarthy's brilliant innings led Ireland's fightback.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain interrupted the match, leading to a DLS method decision.
